Code: EXEC SQL SELECT OCORHIST, OPERACAO, DTMOVTO, NOMFAV, LIMCRR, TIPFAV, DATNEG, FONPAG, VAL_OPERACAO, TIMESTAMP, SITUACAO, T2.DES_OPERACAO, T2.DES_ABREVIADA, T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO FROM seguros.v0histsini T1, T2 WHERE T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T1.SITUACAO = '0' AND T1.OPERACAO = T2.COD_OPERACAO AND T2.IDE_SISTEMA = 'SI' AND T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO IN ('LIB','JLIND','ALIB','JLDP') AND T2.COD_OPERACAO NOT IN (1070,1071,1072,1073,1074) ORDER BY 1,2 END SQL
